title: Hey riot

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hey riot

So if you see the following link, you'll see a pantheon with absolutely nothing!
Reason: Dc's straight away....
Why: Because he got last pick, says he's gonna troll....
Anyway, due to this stupid  F U C K  i was demoted...
So riot heres my question:
"Why dont you put the loss of LP / gain of LP lower since an afk / dc moron did something like this"
Please answer, i dont really care if ur not apart of riot, i just want ur opinion

replies.body: no matter what u zay they dont giv a fuq unfortunately
